title: IoT Engineering Practical Leadership Education Based on OBE-CDIO Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering concepts and understanding of IT systems
context.additional_context: Establishment of a digital device-based practical learning environment, team IoT project execution, and operation of a feedback loop system

learning_goals: Over 85% of learners can independently explain the IoT system design process according to the OBE-CDIO model
Teams iteratively develop and evaluate IoT solution prototypes reflecting real-world industry problems from participating companies at least three times
By the end of training, over 90% of learners demonstrate practical competency in connecting IoT technology applications to industrial contexts
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
